fullText: As the harsh, unforgiving waves crash with abandon in the opening moments of Rob Marshall’s “The Little Mermaid,” there is a sense that a true loss of innocence is on the brink. In this new live-action adaptation things are not as bubblegum sweet and bright as the last time we visited Ariel’s story.
rejectionReasoning: claude: This text is reviewing Rob Marshall's live-action film adaptation of 'The Little Mermaid', not a Broadway theatrical production.; openai: The text is about the live-action adaptation of 'The Little Mermaid' by Rob Marshall, not a Broadway show.; kimi: This text reviews Rob Marshall's 2023 live-action film adaptation of 'The Little Mermaid,' not a Broadway theatrical production.
